Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits domain front running
Summary: Prohibits any person or entity from registering, reserving, or otherwise acquiring a domain name based on knowledge acquired through non-public information of a third party's interest in that domain name.
LawCode: Amd ยง147, add ยง148-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting domain front running
